blog_posts.title: What Are You Going to Do With Your Life?
blog_posts.context: Written for a Rice University entrepreneurship class, this post reflects on the intersection of family legacy and a personal drive for innovation in technology.
blog_posts.summary: This post explores Mike's entrepreneurial journey, deeply influenced by a family history in shipping software. It covers how observing his parents build Veson Nautical from the ground up demystified the process of starting a company. The narrative connects his early exposure to tech to his hands-on experience developing the first Veson Nautical Mobile App, illustrating a full-circle moment that solidified his passion for building impactful software.
